segments.text: Observing this scene, the kitchen looks busy with routine tasks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is focused on drying that plate, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's running freely from the tap, though, unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing now, spilling onto the floor in sheets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed her shoe's wet from the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the other side, a boy's climbing the stool to the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching right into the cookie jar with determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are spread wide, looking unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl nearby has her arm up, eager for a cookie too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're keeping it quiet so mom doesn't turn around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside the window is neat and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight filters in, highlighting the dishes on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll get away with their little theft.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic kid moment in an otherwise ordinary kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
